 2008-02462008-02-07,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
PrecisREGULATIONS Amending the INTEREST RATES (EXCISE TAX ACT) REGULATIONS which harmonize the interest and penalty provisions of the GST/HST portion of the Act (part IX) with the non-GST/HST portion as well as with the Income Tax Act, the Excise Act, 2001, and the Air Travellers Security Charge Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0036 Publication Date: 2008-02-20
